content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.

content: Mister Schmidt, as a student, I'm very conscious of my expenses. content: Emilia, your offer of 550 Euros per month is indeed a fair one, considering the current market standards. I appreciate your honesty and your commitment to being a good tenant. I'm willing to accept your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
